author: Jessica Morgan
title: UAE distributes aid to more than 13,000 Palestinians in Gaza
text:
The UAE has distributed aid to more than 13,000 displaced Palestinians in Gaza affected by the Israel-Gaza war.
Aid included food parcels, tents, blankets, sleeping bags, supplies for women and items for children, said officials.
It comes part of the UAE's Operation Gallant Knight 3 humanitarian initiative, which aims to alleviate the suffering of Palestinians in Gaza.
Around 2,454 food parcels were distributed to displaced Palestinians in various locations in and around Khan Younis and Rafah in southern Gaza.
The UAE this week sent more than 1.6 million items of warm clothing and blankets to Gaza to help Palestinians cope with winter conditions.
Read more Fifth batch of UAE medical volunteers head to Gaza to treat wounded Palestinians The aid convoy was overseen by the Emirates Red Crescent, the humanitarian arm of the UAE government, as part of its Be their Warmth campaign. Supplies will be distributed in phases.
More than 21,100 people have been killed in Israeli attacks on Gaza since the war broke out, Gaza's Health Ministry said on Thursday.
The vast majority of Gaza's 2.2 million population is believed to have been displaced by the fighting, highlighting the urgent need for humanitarian aid.
Latest from the Israel-Gaza war – in pictures
Israel Resists Growing Calls For Ceasefire In Gaza A Palestinian child injured in Israeli air strikes is brought to Nasser Medical Hospital in Khan Yunis, Gaza. Getty Images
Updated: December 29, 2023, 4:47 AM

author: Gabriel Salim
title: Bolo de chocolate fofinho feito com óleo e água
text: Foto: Ana Bacellar Essa receita fácil de bolo de chocolate utiliza óleo que garante uma massa úmida por mais tempo e água, o que deixa o bolo mais leve, escuro e “chocolatudo”. Foto: alter_photo - stock.adobe.com/Adobe stock Chocolate em pó, açúcar, farinha de trigo, fermento em pó, bicarbonato de sódio, óleo vegetal, ovos, água morna, manteiga para untar e farinha de trigo para polvilhar. Foto: brizmaker - stock.adobe.com/Adobe stock Aqueça o forno a 180ºC (médio-alto). Unte com manteiga e polvilhe com farinha uma fôrma grande pra pudim ou uma assadeira também grande. Foto: exclusive-design - stock.adobe.com/Adobe st Misture o chocolate, o açúcar, a farinha, o fermento e o bicarbonato numa tigela grande. Junte a manteiga, os ovos, o leite e mexa até conseguir uma massa homogênea. Foto: kosoff - stock.adobe.com/Adobe stock Coloque a massa na fôrma e asse por uns 40min, até crescer, firmar e soltar das laterais (ao enfiar um palito no centro, ele deverá sair limpo). Foto: agneskantaruk - stock.adobe.com/Adobe stock Deixe esfriar, desenforme e, se for o caso, regue com a cobertura. Deixe firmar antes de servir. Foto: Alex Silva/Estadão Prático e super fácil de fazer. Essa receita simples de bolo de milho verde tem uma textura bem cremosa e úmida, como se fosse um pudim, ótimo para comer com um café no lanche da tarde. Gabriel Salim

Sumar carga contra el nombramiento de la nueva directora del Instituto de las Mujeres por sus posturas sobre la ley trans
eldiario.es
El partido de Yolanda Díaz considera inaceptable la elección de Isabel García, que en los últimos años ha lanzado afirmaciones en las que hablaba de "dictadura queer", de "delirio queer" o de que "las mujeres trans no existen"
